code: import{AppConfig,UserSession,showConnect}from'@stacks/connect';import{Person}from'@stacks/profile';var appConfig=new AppConfig(['store_write','publish_data']);export var userSession=new UserSession({appConfig:appConfig});export function authenticate(){showConnect({appDetails:{name:'ADAD Project',icon:window.location.origin+'/logo512.png'},redirectTo:'/',onFinish:function onFinish(){window.location.reload();},onCancel:function onCancel(){console.log('cancelled');},userSession:userSession});}export function getUserData(){return userSession.loadUserData();}export function getPerson(){return new Person(getUserData().profile);}
